1: Push B4 into SA1 (bottom right) then move backwards out of SA1, towards the bottom of the screen
10: Push B5 into the center of SA1, slightly pushing B2 up and to the left, then release and go back a little (towards the right of the screen)
2: Grasp B1 then turn around and push it into SA1
3: Grasp B3 then move backwards and spin to the left to drop it in SA1
4: Grab B2 and leave it in SA1, displacing B3 downards slightly (but both are in SA1 at the end), then move to the top left of SA1
5: Nudge b1 to the right so that it ends up inside SA1, but then move backwards to the left edge of the screen
6: Push B3 into SA1 (on the bottom), then move backwards to the left edge
7: Release B1 in SA1 then drive half of the way down towards B4
8: Push B4 into SA1 (on the left edge) and nudge B2 down and to the right a bit
9: Grab B4, then spin around and leave it in SA1, before reversing a bit to end up outside of SA1
